full_summary:
Tender Announcement
-----------------------------------
### Solicitation Number
WS4628560315

### RFP Title
[Request for Proposal for Laminated Tempered Glass Supplies][1]

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Correctional Service Canada (CSC) for the acquisition of laminated tempered glass supplies, including delivery to Ste-Anne-des-Plaines, QC, Canada.

### Scope of Work
The RFP calls for the delivery of laminated tempered glass products, as outlined in the Annex Statement of Requirement.

### Tender Details

* **RFP Posting Date:** June 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **RFP Expiration Date:** July 4, 2024
* **Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
* **Contract End Date:** October 18, 2024

### Selection Criteria
The selection of the proponent will be based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Geographical Scope
The delivery of goods and services shall take place in Ste-Anne-des-Plaines, QC, Canada.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Melanie Caty, PWGSC/SPAC
* Email: [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][2]

### Update on this RFP
Please consult the [notice URL][3] for additional information.

---
